title: Parcel Management
description: This is one of my finest creations—a restaurant site boasting incredible functionality and UI/UX. Utilized CRUD, JWT, and various features for an exceptional user experience.
features: In this site, we have 3 types of dashboards
Dynamically user, all delivery man, total book are all dynamic
Users can delete, update a parcel

title: Khala-Pina-Restaurant

title: Tech Brand Website
